appDesc.message: Jaydai: Maximize AI Potential. Jaydai is a Chrome extension offering a library of high-quality prompts.

useAIToPrefix.description: Prefix for the changing tasks in the welcome page

welcomeDescription.message: Maximize your generative AI experience with Jaydai, the free Chrome extension that transforms how you use ChatGPT.

energyInsights.message: Unlock the full potential of AI

energyInsightsDesc.message: Access our library of prompts created by experts and organized by topic.

smartTemplatesDesc.message: Access our library of prompts created by experts and organized by topic.

skillDevelopmentDesc.message: Get detailed analytics on your usage and energy footprint.

aiToolsCopilotDesc.message: Microsoft Copilot AI-powered search and chat

aiUsageTrackingDesc.message: Monitor your AI interactions, understand patterns, and gain insights into your digital workflow.

personalizedInsightsDesc.message: Receive actionable recommendations to improve your AI usage and maintain your skills.

continuousLearningDesc.message: Develop a balanced approach to AI assistance with weekly reports and skill development tips.

readyToUnlock.message: Ready to Unlock Your AI Potential?

readyToUnlockDesc.message: Jaydai helps you harness the power of AI while maintaining your unique human expertise.

betaFeatureWarningMessage.message: We are still building and refining our analytics features. If you encounter any issues, please email us at

featureInDevelopment.message: We're still building this exciting $FEATURE$ feature! Your support gives us energy to build faster.

analyticsDescription.message: Detailed insights about your AI interactions and usage patterns

efficiencyDescription.message: How effectively you use AI based on various metrics

higherBetter.message: Higher is better - getting more output for your input

lowerBetter.message: Lower is better - more energy efficient

advancedLevel.message: Advanced AI user - good conversation flow

noviceLevel.message: Novice AI user - beginning your journey

insightsDescription.message: AI-generated insights based on your usage patterns

deepEngagement.message: You engage in deep, thorough conversations with AI. This approach is excellent for complex topics and detailed explanations.

balancedEngagement.message: You maintain a balanced conversation flow with AI. This approach works well for most queries.

briefInteractions.message: You prefer brief interactions with AI. Consider extended conversations for more complex topics.

highEfficiency.message: Your input/output ratio is excellent. You receive substantial AI responses relative to your prompts.

goodEfficiency.message: Your input/output ratio is good. You get good value from your interactions.

improvableEfficiency.message: Your input/output ratio could be improved. Consider using more specific, focused prompts.

highFrequency.message: You are a frequent AI user, making it a regular part of your workflow.

moderateFrequency.message: You use AI moderately, balancing it with other tools.

lowFrequency.message: You use AI occasionally. Consider exploring more use cases to increase productivity.

efficiencyTipDesc.message: Try using more specific prompts to get more focused responses and improve your efficiency score.

outputRatioTipDesc.message: Your AI responses are relatively short compared to your inputs. Consider asking for more detailed or comprehensive answers.

responseTimeTipDesc.message: Your average response time is a bit high. Consider breaking complex questions into smaller parts for faster responses.

expertDesc.message: You use AI with exceptional efficiency and effectiveness.

advancedDesc.message: You are skilled at getting valuable results from AI.

proficientDesc.message: You use AI effectively with good results.

developingDesc.message: You are learning to use AI more effectively.

noviceDesc.message: You are beginning your journey with AI.

keyMetricsDesc.message: Key metrics about your AI usage
